name: action_recruitment
title: Recruitment
subtitle: Action
description: Take 3 cards from one of the two decks
and put 2 back at the bottom of the deck.

name: action_stealth
title: Stealth
subtitle: Action
description: Deploy one unit face down.
Take back two cards.

name: action_air_strike
title: Air strike
subtitle: Action
description: Choose a deployed opponent unit
to be discarded.

name: action_traitor
title: Traitor
subtitle: Action
description: Choose a deployed opponent unit and
deploy it on your side.

name: action_defection
title: Defection
subtitle: Action
description: Swap one of your deployed units with
an opponent's unit on the same battlefield.

name: action_evacuation
title: Evacuation
subtitle: Action
description: Take one of your deployed units back
into your hand.

name: action_redeployment
title: Redeployment
subtitle: Action
description: Move one of your deployed units to
another battlefield.

name: action_rotation
title: Rotation
subtitle: Action
description: Swap one of your deployed units with
a unit from your hand.

name: action_spy_plane
title: Spy plane
subtitle: Action
description: Look at 3 cards from an opponent's hand.

name: action_prisoners
title: Prisoners
subtitle: Action
description: Take a random card from an opponent's
hand and choose a card from your hand
to give back.
